name: YARN JAR: 1 Quart Buggy
description:
The YARN JAR™ is a clean and sleek solution to the problem of the loose and fuzzy ball of yarn.  
The yarn is drawn smoothly and easily out of the YARN JAR through the hole in the lid.  The jars are heavy glass in a charming farmhouse style with a brushed silver lid and fun graphics, and they come in two sizes: One Quart and Two Quart.

Shipping is available within the continental US only.  
Shipping one to four One Quart jars:  $14.95
Shipping one Two Quart jar:  $14.95
Shipping two to four Two Quart jars:  $24.95

name: Kettle Dyed Sock:  RHUBARB
description:
Every skein is a little bit different!  RHUBARB is a combination of the sweet and sour that we enjoy every Spring.  A bright chartreuse paired with hot pink--it's delicious!

Locally hand dyed sock yarn, Kettle Dyed Sock is 115 grams of fingering weight wool yarn with nylon for durability. These skeins are a generous 484 yards, plenty for a great pair of socks or for a knitted or crocheted scarf or shawl.

name: Kettle Dyed Sock:  PUCKER
description:
Every skein is a little bit different, PUCKER is a bright, bright yellow-green. The color of a flower's stem, close to chartreuse--it's eye-popping and beautiful!

Locally hand dyed sock yarn, Kettle Dyed Sock is 115 grams of fingering weight wool yarn with nylon for durability.  These skeins are a generous 484 yards, plenty for a great pair of socks or for a knitted or crocheted scarf or shawl.

name: Kettle Dyed Sock:  Grape Jelly
description:
Every skein is a little bit different, Grape Jelly is a bright, lavender purple. Gorgeous worked alone or alongside another color (or two!)

Locally hand dyed sock yarn, Kettle Dyed Sock is 115 grams of fingering weight wool yarn with nylon for durability.  These skeins are a generous 484 yards, plenty for a great pair of socks or for a knitted or crocheted scarf or shawl.

name: Rainbow Sampler
description: 90 grams of Kettle Dyed Sock in 6 sunshiney hues!  Enough for a pair of socks, or a groovy fair isle hat.  Great for the shawlettes and wraps we love!  Perfect for the Happy Baby Cap as seen on Ravelry.com.
